metadata.title: CVE-2024-43360 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: ZoneMinder is a free, open source closed-circuit television softwareapplication. ZoneMinder is affected by a time-based SQL Injectionvulnerability. This vulnerability is fixed in 1.36.34 and 1.37.61.

criterions.comment: zoneminder package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
